mapper.update: update certificate set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, certificate_status_id = #{certificateStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, certificate_status_id, timestamp, address, receiver, receiver_phone from certificate
